variable.name: GENEVA ID
variable.description: Proband's randomly generated study ID

variable.name: GENDER
variable.description: Proband's Gender
variable.comment: As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: M_RACE
variable.description: Mother's Race
variable.comment: As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.
variable.value: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

variable.name: F_RACE
variable.description: Father's Race
variable.comment: As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.
variable.value: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

variable.name: P_RACE
variable.description: Proband's Race
variable.comment: As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.
variable.value: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

variable.name: P_CLEFT_I
variable.description: Proband's Type of Cleft - General Specification
variable.comment: Modeled on oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, Questions 10-13: IF Q10=1 AND Q12=1 THEN P_cleft_I=3; IF Q10=1 AND Q12=1 AND Q11=1 THEN P_cleft_II=7; IF Q10=1 AND Q12=1 AND Q11=2 THEN P_cleft_II=6; IF Q10=1 AND Q12=1 AND Q11=3 THEN P_cleft_II=8. IF Q10=1 AND Q12=2 THEN P_cleft_I=2; IF Q10=1 AND Q12=2 AND Q11=1 THEN P_cleft_II=4; IF Q10=1 AND Q12=2 AND Q11=2 THEN P_cleft_II=3; ; IF Q10=1 AND Q12=2 AND Q11=3 THEN P_cleft_II=5. IF Q10=2 AND Q12=2 THEN P_cleft_I=1; IF Q10=2 AND Q12=2 AND Q13=1 THEN P_cleft_II=1; IF Q10=2 AND Q12=2 AND Q13=2 THEN P_cleft_II=2. OTHERWISE P_CLEFT_I =9 and/or P_CLEFT_II=9. As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: P_CLEFT_II
variable.description: Proband's Type of Cleft - Exact Specification
variable.comment: Modeled on oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, Questions 10-13: IF Q10=1 AND Q12=1 THEN P_cleft_I=3; IF Q10=1 AND Q12=1 AND Q11=1 THEN P_cleft_II=7; IF Q10=1 AND Q12=1 AND Q11=2 THEN P_cleft_II=6; IF Q10=1 AND Q12=1 AND Q11=3 THEN P_cleft_II=8. IF Q10=1 AND Q12=2 THEN P_cleft_I=2; IF Q10=1 AND Q12=2 AND Q11=1 THEN P_cleft_II=4; IF Q10=1 AND Q12=2 AND Q11=2 THEN P_cleft_II=3; ; IF Q10=1 AND Q12=2 AND Q11=3 THEN P_cleft_II=5. IF Q10=2 AND Q12=2 THEN P_cleft_I=1; IF Q10=2 AND Q12=2 AND Q13=1 THEN P_cleft_II=1; IF Q10=2 AND Q12=2 AND Q13=2 THEN P_cleft_II=2. OTHERWISE P_CLEFT_I =9 and/or P_CLEFT_II=9. As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: M_CLEFT
variable.description: Mother's Cleft
variable.comment: On page 15 of the oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, a pedigree was drawn. Each investigator looked by hand and determined the level of family history and relatedness to the proband (case child). As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: F_CLEFT
variable.description: Father's Cleft
variable.comment: On page 15 of the oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, a pedigree was drawn. Each investigator looked by hand and determined the level of family history and relatedness to the proband (case child). As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: FAMHX_I
variable.description: Any family history of oral clefts - general
variable.comment: On page 15 of the oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, a pedigree was drawn. Each investigator looked by hand and determined the level of family history and relatedness to the proband (case child). As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.
variable.value: Negative family history of oral clefts
Positive family history of oral clefts

variable.name: FAMHX_II
variable.description: Family history of oral clefts - specific
variable.comment: On page 15 of the oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, a pedigree was drawn. Each investigator looked by hand and determined the level of family history and relatedness to the proband (case child). As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.
variable.value: No family history of oral clefts
Affected 1st degree relatives ONLY (parents, sibs or children)
Affected 2nd degree relatives ONLY (half-sibs, grandparents, aunts or uncles)
Affected 3rd degree relatives and beyond ONLY (cousins and other relatives)

variable.name: MSMOKE_PRIOR
variable.description: Did the mother smoke 3 months prior to pregnancy?
variable.comment: Modeled on oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, Question 58 As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: MSMOKE_3MON
variable.description: Did the mother smoke in the first 3 months of pregnancy?
variable.comment: Modeled on oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, Question 60 As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: MSMOKE
variable.description: Did the mother smoke in the perinatal period (3 months prior through 3rd month of pregnancy)?
variable.comment: Modeled on oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, calculated from questions 58 and 60: IF msmoke_prior=1 OR msmoke_3mon=1, then MSMOKE=1 OR IF msmoke_prior=9 AND msmoke_3mon=1, then MSMOKE =1 OR IF msmoke_prior=1 AND msmoke_3mon=9, then MSMOKE=1 OR IF msmoke_prior=9 AND msmoke_3mon=9, then MSMOKE=9 OR IF the investigator did not ask the question in this manner, but had some information on smoking during pregnancy time period, then used this information as an acceptable answer. (MSMOKE_prior and msmoke_3mon could both be '9' and msmoke=1 OR MSMOKE=0 in this case; investigator supplied answers were verified and accepted.) ELSE MSMOKE=0 As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: ETS
variable.description: During the three months before or during her entire pregnancy did anyone, besides the mother, regularly smoke cigarettes in her home, workplace or any other place near her?
variable.comment: Modeled on oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, Question 66 As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: MVITS_PRIOR
variable.description: Did the mother take multivitamins or prenatal vitamins 3 months prior to pregnancy?
variable.comment: Modeled on oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, Question 15: Once a participant answered 'yes', the interviewer went to 'suppl_med table.doc' to get the specifics of the medicine/supplement use. Ques. F. specifically asks about the time period. As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: MVITS_3MON
variable.description: Did the mother take multivitamins or prenatal vitamins in the first 3 months of pregnancy?
variable.comment: Modeled on oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, Question 15: Once a participant answered 'yes', the interviewer went to 'suppl_med table.doc' to get the specifics of the medicine/supplement use. Ques. F. specifically asks about the time period. As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: MVITS
variable.description: Did the mother take multivitamins or prenatal vitamins in the perinatal period (3 months prior through 3rd month of pregnancy)?
variable.comment: Modeled on oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, Question 15: IF mvits_prior=1 OR mvits_3mon=1, then Mvits=1 OR IF mvits_prior=9 AND mvits_3mon=1, then Mvits =1 OR IF mvits_prior=1 AND mvits_3mon=9, then Mvits=1 OR IF mvits_prior=9 AND mvits_3mon=9, then Mvits=9 OR IF the investigator did not ask the question in this manner, but had some information on smoking during pregnancy time period, then used this information as an acceptable answer. (Mvits_prior and mvits_3mon could both be '9' and mvits=1 OR Mvits=0 in this case; investigator supplied answers were verified and accepted.) ELSE Mvits=0 As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: MDRINK_PRIOR
variable.description: Did the mother regularly drink alcohol 3 months prior to pregnancy?
variable.comment: Modeled on oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, Question 77 As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: MDRINK_3MON
variable.description: Did the mother regularly drink alcohol in the first 3 months of pregnancy?

The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.

variable.name: MDRINK
variable.description: Did the mother regularly drink alcohol in the perinatal period (3 months prior through 3rd month of pregnancy)?
variable.comment: Modeled on oral_cleft_study_questionnaire_v3.1, calculated from questions 77 and 82: IF mdrink_prior=1 OR mdrink_3mon=1, then Mdrink=1 OR IF mdrink_prior=9 AND mdrink_3mon=1, then Mdrink =1 OR IF mdrink_prior=1 AND mdrink_3mon=9, then Mdrink=1 OR IF mdrink_prior=9 AND mdrink_3mon=9, then Mdrink=9 OR IF the investigator did not ask the question in this manner, but had some information on smoking during pregnancy time period, then used this information as an acceptable answer. (Mdrink_prior and mdrink_3mon could both be '9' and mdrink=1 OR Mdrink=0 in this case; investigator supplied answers were verified and accepted.) ELSE Mdrink=0 As this was a consortium of oral cleft investigators, each group collected information with various questionnaires and various levels of detail. The document "Phenotypes and Phenotypic harmonization_forDCC.pdf" was sent to all collaborators to collect the specific variables.
